net.jforum.dao

Interface ConfigDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericConfigDAO

    public interface ConfigDAO
    Model interface for the Config class.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(Config config)
      Deletes some specific configuration
      void insert(Config config)
      Insert a new configuration.

      Gets all existing configuration entries

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        void insert(Config config)
        Insert a new configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - The data to store.

        Updates some config entry
        Parameters:
        config - The entry to update

        void delete(Config config)
        Deletes some specific configuration
        Parameters:
        config - The config to delete

      • selectAll

        List selectAll()
        Gets all existing configuration entries
        Returns:
        java.util.List with all records found. Each entry is a net.jforum.entities.Config instance.

      • selectByName

        Gets a config by its name
        Parameters:
        name - The name to search for.
        Returns:
        Config
